txt.en: The memorial dedicated to Cuthard is close, but you notice a White Hand Orc camp also nearby -- perhaps the source of the enemy movements in the Writhendowns.
You have defeated the Writhendowns Captain near Cuthard's memorial.
The memorial dedicated to Cuthard is close, but you notice a White Hand Orc camp also nearby -- perhaps the source of the enemy movements in the Writhendowns.
White Hand Captains don't typically stray far from their camps, the appearance of this one must mean there is a nearby camp. Defeat him before he calls for reinforcements.
The White Hand presence is so strong here that it can only be assumed that a captain is nearby.\n\nYou should defeat the Writhendowns Captain at Cuthard's memorial.
You have defeated the Writhendowns Captain near Cuthard's memorial.
